sheet.name: Version Info
sheet.query: SELECT sqlite_version() as sqlite_version, '${DATE.KST:YYYY년 MM월 DD일 HH시 mm분}' as report_date_kst, '${DATE:YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss}' as report_date_local

sheet.name: Tables
sheet.query: SELECT name as table_name, type as object_type, sql as create_sql FROM sqlite_master WHERE type IN ('table', 'view') AND name NOT LIKE 'sqlite_%' ORDER BY type, name LIMIT 50

sheet.name: Timezone Examples
sheet.query: SELECT 'Seoul (KST)' as timezone, '${DATE.KST:YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss}' as datetime UNION ALL SELECT 'UTC', '${DATE.UTC:YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss}' UNION ALL SELECT 'Tokyo (JST)', '${DATE.JST:YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss}' UNION ALL SELECT 'Local Time', '${DATE:YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss}'

sheet.name: Test Data
sheet.query: SELECT 1 as id, 'Test 1' as name, datetime('now') as created_at UNION ALL SELECT 2, 'Test 2', datetime('now', '-1 day') UNION ALL SELECT 3, 'Test 3', datetime('now', '-7 day')
